description:
I’m Black Latina. Matura, funny, affectionate, romantic, charismatic, given, loyal, passionate and easy to get along with. I love traveling, going to the movies, ocean, walking on the beach, watching the sunset, hiking, bowling, concerts, shows, piano bars, cooking or spending quiet time at home with that special someone. 

I’m looking for that special man that will make me happy. Someone stable, charismatic, loyal, passionate, affectionate, easy going and with a great personality. I’m looking for a Ltr that will lead to a lifetime together. I’m not opposed to relocating for the right person.
